lemma add_assoc: assumes a: "a \<in> carrier R" and b: "b \<in> carrier R" and ab: "nonsingular a b" and p\<^sub>1: "on_curve a b p\<^sub>1" and p\<^sub>2: "on_curve a b p\<^sub>2" and p\<^sub>3: "on_curve a b p\<^sub>3" shows "add a p\<^sub>1 (add a p\<^sub>2 p\<^sub>3) = add a (add a p\<^sub>1 p\<^sub>2) p\<^sub>3"
